# Chapter 3: Advanced Topics

This chapter covers advanced features.

## Custom Workflows

You can create custom workflows for:

- Automated review cycles
- Collaborative editing
- Version tracking

<!-- NOTE: 2024-01-17T09:15:00 - This section needs expansion -->

## Integration with Claude

The MCP server enables Claude to:

1. **List sections** - See the structure of a chapter
2. **Read sections** - Get content by heading or index
3. **Update sections** - Modify content while preserving structure
4. **Add notes** - Leave timestamped annotations
5. **List notes** - Review all annotations

## Best Practices

### Organizing Content

Keep sections focused on single topics.

### Using Notes Effectively

Use notes for:
- Review reminders
- TODO items
- Collaboration messages

<!-- NOTE: 2024-01-18T16:45:00 - Add examples of note usage -->

### Version Control

Always commit after significant changes.

## Future Enhancements

Planned features include:

- Section reordering
- Bulk note operations
- Export capabilities
